Class Assessment

  • java.lang.Object
    • Assessment
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Assignment, Exam
    public abstract class Assessment
extends java.lang.Object
    Implements Assessments of a Unit which stores various attributes such as weight, title comments.

    • Method Detail

      • addStudentMarks

        public void addStudentMarks​(int studentID,
                            int marks,
                            java.lang.String comments,
                            Unit currentUnit)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Stores Student ID for a student. Storing comments are optional refer to the overload method. The studentID and mark are stored inside a HashMap where studentId is the key and Mark object is the value. The current unit os passed for the marks of that unit to be stored.
        Parameters:
        studentID - each student is assigned a unique id
        marks - the marks which are recorded for a specific assessment
        comments - comments on the assessment
        currentUnit - the unit to which the assessment belongs to
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - when the marks of student input are less than 0 or greater than 100

                     throws java.lang.Exception
